name: Giant Goat
description: A large, horned herbivore with thick, coarse fur and impressive, curved horns.
memorable: Known for powerful headbutts that can knock enemies prone.
goals: Grazes on grasses and shrubs in mountainous terrain.
relations: Often found in hilly regions, could encounter other herbivores or predators.
strengths: High physical strength and resilient, exceptional at climbing steep slopes.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and minimal magical abilities.
attacks: Strong Ram attack that can deal bludgeoning damage and knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: Charge ability deals extra damage and can knock the target prone.
skills: Proficient in Athletics, showcasing good climbing and jumping abilities.
additional_information: Has a Terrifying Scream to frighten nearby enemies
Strong saving throw bonuses against grappling
Average defensive capabilities with decent hit points
Very good physical power despite low intelligence
test_queries: strong goat that can knock foes down
peaceful giant goat with a frightening scream
